resources.string:
It is an exciting game for all aged group. This does not only entertains you but also helps to develop your mental capacity. 
 
How to Play: 

1. Guess a 4 letters word and type in the GUESS WORD space. 

2. The number that appears in COW Column means, the numbers of correct alphabet you guessed but not in correct place . Whereas when the guessed alphabet is correct and also placed in the right position , it appears in Bull Column. 

3. Keep on guessing and exercising your brain until you get the right word and secure 4 in Bull column. 

4. You are not allow to enter same character in a word.


Keep playing keep growing ENJOY.
